scripts.dev:clean: npm run cleanup && npm run kill-ports && timeout /t 3 /nobreak && npm run check-ports
scripts.cleanup: taskkill /f /im node.exe 2>nul || echo 'No node processes to kill'
scripts.kill-ports: for /f "tokens=5" %a in ('netstat -aon ^| findstr :3001') do taskkill /f /pid %a 2>nul || echo 'Port 3001 is free'
scripts.kill-frontend: for /f "tokens=5" %a in ('netstat -aon ^| findstr :5173') do taskkill /f /pid %a 2>nul || echo 'Port 5173 is free' && for /f "tokens=5" %a in ('netstat -aon ^| findstr :5174') do taskkill /f /pid %a 2>nul || echo 'Port 5174 is free'
scripts.start: cd backend && npm run build && node dist/index.js
scripts.stable:start: npm run cleanup && npm run kill-ports && timeout /t 2 /nobreak && npm run start
scripts.stable:dev: npm run cleanup && npm run kill-ports && timeout /t 2 /nobreak && npm run dev
scripts.stop: npm run cleanup && npm run kill-ports && npm run check-ports
